entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Akulivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:34 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -36.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Akulivik Airport 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -36.3°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -40.5°C
Wind: NNE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 37.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 37. Wind chill minus 54 this morning and minus 48 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 42. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 32.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 56 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
